definitions.definition: cannabis, especially as smoked in cigarettes.
examples: cannabis, hashish, hemp, sinsemilla; Moreinformalpot, dope, grass, weed, Mary Jane, bud, hash, bhang, kef, ganja, locoweed; reefer, doob, spliff, toke, roach "the illegal cultivation of marijuana"Morepot, dope, grass, weed, Mary Jane, bud, hash, bhang, kef, ganja, locoweed; reefer, doob, spliff, toke, roach the illegal cultivation of marijuana
